text: Hagi tamagera okaniho, Sodomu rankumate'ma, Gomora rankumate'ma, ana tava'onte'ma me'nea kumatamimpima monko avu'avazama hu antahintahimo avitege'za, omane'neankna monko'za hu'naze. E'i ana kumatamina tevereti zamahe fanane hu'neankino, e'i ana hukna hu'za kefo'zama nehaza vahera, henka'a tevava tevefi mani'ne'za zamata erigahaze. (Jen-Agf 19.)
